function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective AI-based approaches for eradicating pandemics","Impact":"Inadequate response to future pandemics, potential for uncontrolled spread of diseases","Mitigation":"Investment in AI research and development, collaboration between AI experts and healthcare professionals","Technologies":"AI techniques, machine learning, predictive analytics","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, policymakers","Owner":"AI researchers, healthcare organizations, government institutions"},{"Description":"Financial stress impacting technology adoption in the short-term","Impact":"Reduced implementation of IoT solutions in sectors like transportation","Mitigation":"Economic recovery measures, financial support for technology adoption, public-private partnerships","Technologies":"IoT, economic recovery strategies","People":"Organizations, governments, businesses","Owner":"Government institutions, private sector"}]}
